title: A Rebel at the Chalet School
description: Originally published in 1934, The Chalet School and The Lintons was broken into two volumes in paperback, the first part retaining the original title, the second (this volume) named A Rebel at the Chalet School. From its small beginnings, The Chalet School becomes one of the most famous girls' schools in the world. It's the dream of many girls to be a pupil there, and there's endless excitement and adventure. One night, Joyce is awakened by someone shaking her, and a hand is slipped over her mouth.
author: Elinor M. Brent-Dyer
